content.html: If you are straight and cisgendered, over the next few years you may start seeing and hearing LGBTQ people a lot less. It may be very gradual and subtle, and therefore hard for you to notice. So, I'm going to say now, while you can still see and hear me- this was deliberate.
content.value:
If you are straight and cisgendered, over the next few years you may start seeing and hearing LGBTQ people a lot less.

It may be very gradual and subtle, and therefore hard for you to notice.

So, I'm going to say now, while you can still see and hear me- this was deliberate.

content.html: And since clearly we're going backwards again: For god's sake if your queer friends say Out There they're roommates or cousins or something then you concur. And if they don't say or someone asks? Don't snitch. Blow their cover with an Actually and they could end up dead.
content.value:
And since clearly we're going backwards again:

For god's sake if your queer friends say Out There they're roommates or cousins or something then you concur. And if they don't say or someone asks? Don't snitch.

Blow their cover with an Actually and they could end up dead.
